S06n591:4: ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhrakūṭe parvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ mahatā ca bodhisattvasaṃghena |
S06n591:5: tena khalu samayena bhagavān gambhīrāvasaṃbodhaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ |
S06n591:6: tena ca samayena āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caryāṃ caramāṇaḥ evaṃ vyavalokayati sma |
S06n591:8: athāyuṣmān śāriputro buddhānubhāvena āryāvalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvametadavocat- yaḥ kaścit kulaputro [vā kuladuhitā vā asyāṃ] gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caryāṃ cartukāmaḥ,
S06n591:10: evamukte āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat- yaḥ kaścicchāriputra kulaputro va kuladuhitā vā [asyāṃ] gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caryāṃ cartukāmaḥ,
S06n591:11: tenaivaṃ vyavalokitavyam-pañca skandhāṃstāṃśca svabhāvaśūnyān samanupaśyati sma |
S06n591:19: evaṃ śāriputra sarvadharmāḥ śūnyatālakṣaṇā anutpannā aniruddhā amalā vimalā anūnā asaṃpūrṇāḥ |
S06n591:25: na cakṣurna śrotraṃ na ghrāṇaṃ na jihvā na kāyo na mano na rūpaṃ na śabdo na gandho na raso na spraṣṭavyaṃ na dharmaḥ |
S06n591:27: na vidyā nāvidyā na kṣayo yāvanna jarāmaraṇaṃ na jarāmaraṇakṣayaḥ,
S06n591:28: na duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgā na jñānaṃ na prāptirnāprāptiḥ |
S06n591:29: tasmācchāriputra aprāptitvena bodhisattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāśritya viharati cittāvaraṇaḥ |
S06n591:32: tasmād jñātavyaḥ prajñāpāramitāmahāmantraḥ anuttaramantraḥ asamasamamantraḥ sarvaduḥkhapraśamanamantraḥ satyamamithyatvāt prajñāpāramitāyāmukto mantraḥ |
S06n591:33: tadyathā- gate gate pāragate pārasaṃgate bodhi svāhā |
S06n591:34: evaṃ śāriputra gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caryāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ bodhisattvena ||
S06n591:35: atha khalu bhagavān tasmātsamādhervyutthāya āryāvalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya sādhukāramadāt- sādhu sādhu kulaputra |
S06n591:37: evametad gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caryaṃ cartavyaṃ yathā tvayā nirdiṣṭam |
S06n591:40: ānandamanā āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ āryāvalokiteśvaraśca bodhisattvaḥ sā ca sarvāvatī pariṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan ||
